subtitleNullable: Distinguish between real and fake news
descriptionNullable:
- The dataset we’ll use for this python project- we’ll call it news.csv. 

- This dataset has a shape of 7796×4. 

- The first column identifies the news
- The second and third are the title and text, 
- The fourth column has labels denoting whether the news is REAL or FAKE. 

- The dataset takes up 30.7MB of space

### The files are separated by month and each has the following columns:
> identifies: Identifies the news
> title: Title of news
> text: Text of news
> label: Labels denoting whether the news is REAL or FAKE
title: Fake News Dataset
